official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the third week of July of 1977,1978, and 1979, as National Architectural Barrier Awareness Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the third week of July 1977, 1978, and 1979, as "National Architectural Barrier Awareness Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the third week of July of 1977,1978, and 1979, as National Architectural Barrier Awareness Week.
